mapper.select: SELECT a.TABLE_NAME AS id, a.TABLE_NAME AS name FROM information_schema.COLUMNS a WHERE a.TABLE_SCHEMA = #{dbName} GROUP BY a.TABLE_NAME

SELECT b.TABLE_COMMENT AS id, b.TABLE_COMMENT AS name FROM information_schema. COLUMNS a LEFT JOIN information_schema. TABLES b ON a.TABLE_NAME = b.TABLE_NAME WHERE a.TABLE_SCHEMA = #{dbName} AND b.TABLE_COMMENT IS NOT NULL AND b.TABLE_COMMENT != '' GROUP BY b.TABLE_COMMENT
